General.Name: Gold By Gold
General.Description: Gold By Gold SA engages in the extraction, refining, and trading of precious metals for individuals and professionals in France. The company also purchases and recycles gold and silver on the internet. In addition, it buys and recycles various gold objects, such as jewelry, accessories, coins, yellow dental gold, watches, plates, ingots, and scrap, as well as silver jewelry, coins, and ingots. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Paris, France.

1.Name: Ms. Sandrine  Schein
1.Title: Mang. of the Refining Division & Director
